PersonalStatement.text: Kerri Suarez, born on 1967-09-07, is a Female based in North Troy, Congo. She is Married and holds Israeli nationality. Currently working at Woods, Good and Hamilton.

WorkExperience.text: Financial Analyst at Price, Diaz and Snyder from 2013 to 2018.
Senior HR Manager at Woods, Good and Hamilton, 2019 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Marketing from Universidad Veracruzana
Master's in Engineering from Belarusian State University of Informatics and Radioelectronics

PersonalSkills.text: Communication: Strong ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.
Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys running marathons.
